entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
